10. CLARIFY

1. This exercise and other parts of this chapter were originally published in Harvard Business Review, titled “If I Read One More Platitude-Filled Mission Statement, I’ll Scream,” October 4, 2012.

2. Big shoutout to Gary Hamel and C. K. Prahalad for their awesome piece in Harvard Business Review, “Strategic Intent,” May 1989, http://hbr.org/1989/05/strategic-intent/ar/1. They talked about how Japanese companies aimed to push beyond their limits. Over time, I’ve found this idea super helpful but it’s evolved enough to be called something else: essential intent.
